Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class Deposit

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.observer.Observable<IServerPacket>
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.Deposit
public class Deposit
extends Observable<IServerPacket>
Models the deposit of a player board, comprehensive of the three rows of resources slots, and the strongbox. Rows are indexed starting from 1 and ending to 3, from top to bottom. The eventual leaders deposit are represented by 4.

    • getAmountOfResource

      public int getAmountOfResource​(Resource resource)
      Gets the total amount of the given resource in this player board.
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to count
      Returns:
      the total amount of the given resource

    • setInitialResources

      public void setInitialResources​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Resource>> selectedResources)
      Set the initial resources chosen by the Player.
      Parameters:
      selectedResources - the resources that the player has selected

    • applyChanges

      public void applyChanges​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Resource>> changes, java.util.List<Resource> marketResult, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Resource>> leadersDeposit) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Applies the given changes to this player deposit, checking if they are legal.
      Parameters:
      changes - a map representing changes to be applied, the key is the identifier of the row (1 -> top, 2 -> middle, 3 -> bottom), the value is the list of resources that represents the new row
      marketResult - a list containing the possibly modified market result
      leadersDeposit - a map representing the leader deposits
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the changes are not legal

    • removeResources

      public void removeResources​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> resources)
      Removes all the given resources from this deposit.
      Parameters:
      resources - a map that associates resource to quantity

    • addToStrongbox

      public void addToStrongbox​(Resource resource)
      Adds the desired resource into the strongbox, modeled by a map of resources and integers. If the type of resource is already stored, it adds one to the current related counter.
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to be added into the strongbox

    • addMultipleToStrongbox

      public void addMultipleToStrongbox​(java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> resources)
      Adds the desired map of resources into the strongbox, modeled by a map of resources and integers. If the type of resource is already stored, it adds one to the current related counter.
      Parameters:
      resources - the map of resources to be added in the strongbox
